metadata.title: CVE-2022-41859 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In freeradius, the EAP-PWD function compute_password_element() leaksinformation about the password which allows an attacker to substantiallyreduce the size of an offline dictionary attack.

criterions.comment: freeradius: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'changes too intrusive').
